rules_text:
When you cast this spell, you may choose another creature it could target. If you do, copy it. The copy targets that creature. [i](The copy becomes a token.)[/i]
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
notes:
Art Validated
When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose new targets for the copy. (They must target different creatures. The copy becomes a token.)
